member.name: T:NUnitAspEx.Client.AspFixtureRequest
member.summary: Encapsulates a request from within a testsuite using the "asptest://" pseudo-protocol.

member.name: T:NUnitAspEx.Client.CustomizableHttpWebRequest
member.summary: Encapsulates the ugly details of deriving from HttpWebRequest.
member.remarks: Since various frameworks like NUnitAsp rely on the output of WebRequest.Create() being of type HttpWebRequest but HttpWebRequest is not customizable the easy way, this class shields further derived classes from the ugly reflection details.

member.name: M:NUnitAspEx.Client.CustomizableHttpWebRequest.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a new instance for the given uri.
member.param: the to create this request for.

member.name: M:NUnitAspEx.Client.CustomizableHttpWebRequest.SubmitRequest(System.Byte[],System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Override this method in your derived class and call to set the response object.

member.name: M:NUnitAspEx.Client.CustomizableHttpWebRequest.CreateOutputStream
member.summary: Create the stream to be used for uploading content.

member.name: M:NUnitAspEx.Core.AspFixtureHost.CreateInstance(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Host instance within a new AppDomain based on the passed in Properties.
member.remarks: You must not call this method from within an existing Host's AppDomain.

member.summary: Unload the passed Host's AppDomain.

member.summary: Return null to avoid timing out of remoting references

member.summary: Initializes the newly created host instance.

member.name: P:NUnitAspEx.Core.AspFixtureHost.Current
member.summary: Use this property to gain access to the Host from within the Host's AppDomain
member.remarks: This property is set only within the Host's AppDomain. Outside the AppDomain it will always return null.

member.name: P:NUnitAspEx.Core.AspFixtureHost.SyncRoot
member.summary: Use to synchronize access to this host instance

member.summary: Returns a reference to the AppDomain, that created this Host instance
